Package com.fssa.librarymanagement.dao

Class BorrowDAO

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.librarymanagement.dao.BorrowDAO
public class BorrowDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) class for handling Borrow-related database operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BorrowDAO()
    Constructs a new BorrowDAO object for performing database operations related to borrow transactions.

  • Method Details

    • borrowBook

      public boolean borrowBook (Borrow borrow) throws DAOException
      Borrows a book for a user.
      Parameters:
      borrow - The Borrow object representing the book borrow
      Returns:
      true if the book is successfully borrowed, false otherwise
      Throws:
      DAOException - If an error occurs during database operation

    • returnBook

      public boolean returnBook (Borrow borrow) throws DAOException
      Returns a borrowed book.
      Parameters:
      borrow - The Borrow object representing the book return
      Returns:
      true if the book is successfully returned, false otherwise
      Throws:
      DAOException - If an error occurs during database operation

    • getBorrowsByUser

      public List<Borrow> getBorrowsByUser (int userId) throws DAOException
      Retrieves a list of borrows by a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user
      Returns:
      A list of Borrow objects for the user
      Throws:
      DAOException - If an error occurs during database operation

    • getBorrowsByBook

      public List<Borrow> getBorrowsByBook (int bookId) throws DAOException
      Retrieves a list of borrows for a book.
      Parameters:
      bookId - The ID of the book
      Returns:
      A list of Borrow objects for the book
      Throws:
      DAOException - If an error occurs during database operation

    • getBorrowById

      public Borrow getBorrowById (int borrowId) throws DAOException
      Retrieves a specific Borrow by its ID.
      Parameters:
      borrowId - The ID of the Borrow to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Borrow object if found, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If an error occurs during database operation.

    • getBorrowByUserAndBook

      public Borrow getBorrowByUserAndBook (int userId, int bookId) throws DAOException
      Retrieves a specific borrow by user ID and book ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user
      bookId - The ID of the book
      Returns:
      The Borrow object if found, otherwise null
      Throws:
      DAOException - If an error occurs during database operation

    • getAllBorrows

      public List<Borrow> getAllBorrows() throws DAOException
      Retrieves a list of all borrows.
      Returns:
      A list of all Borrow objects
      Throws:
      DAOException - If an error occurs during database operation

    • getAvailableCopiesCount

      public int getAvailableCopiesCount (int bookId) throws DAOException
      Retrieves the count of available copies for a book.
      Parameters:
      bookId - The ID of the book
      Returns:
      The count of available copies for the book
      Throws:
      DAOException - If an error occurs during database operation

    • getBorrowedBooksCountByUser

      public int getBorrowedBooksCountByUser (int userId) throws DAOException
      Retrieves the count of borrowed books by a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user
      Returns:
      The count of borrowed books for the user
      Throws:
      DAOException - If an error occurs during database operation
